textDownloadRecoveryCodes: You can use recovery codes as a second factor to authentication in case you lose access to your device. We recommend saving them a secure password manager such as 1PAssword, Authy or Keeper
alertRecoveryCodes: Keep your recovery codes in a safe spot
alertDetailRecoveryCodes: If you lose your device and can't find your recovery codes, you will lose access to your account.
savedRecoveryCodes: You have saved your recovery codes.
recommendationSaveCodeRecovery: To activate two-factor authentication, please confirm that you have saved the recovery codes.
twoFactorMessage: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is now enabled for your account BELOBABA
twoFactorSecondMessage: You have activated the double authentication factor. We now use the code from your password manager application, at the following times:
twoFactorActionTwo: Confirm withdrawals from your BELOBABA account
twoFactorAlertMessage: For security, you need to activate two-factor authentication to confirm withdrawals in your BELOBABA account.
verificationToken: Performing Two-Factor Authentication Retrieval Request Token Verification
verificationTokenForRecoveryTwoFactorSuc: The request has been processed successfully

onboardingTitle: Create a BELOBABA account, it's free!
helpTextMiddleName: Fill this space only if you have a middle name on your ID. If you don’t leave the space blank.

helpTextTaxIDNumber: Write your TAX ID number from your country. (SSN, ITIN, Rif, CPF, DNI, CIF, TIN, RUT).

helpTextCompanyName: Write down the company name as it appears on company docs.

helpTextEstablishedDate: Fill in the date the company was established.
accountPropuseHelpText: Write briefly the use you are going to make of the account. Example: Sales invoicing, payroll payment, payment to suppliers, payment of services.
sourceAssetsAndIncomeHelpText: Briefly describe your commercial activity and the origin of the funds that would be transacted through your BELOBABA account or wallet.
intendedUseAccountHelpText: Describe the use for which the account will be put. Example: swap from crypto to fiat. Custody billing account. Account for transactions within the USA.
anticipatedTypesAssetsHelpText: Place the assets you hope to buy or sell in your BELOBABA wallet. Example: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano, etc.
anticipatedTradingPatternsHelpText: Describe the type of movements you expect to make with your crypto asset wallet. Example: Purchase and sale of assets, exchange of one asset for another, others.
anticipatedMonthlyTransactionsIncomingHe: Number of incoming transactions you expect to enter monthly.
anticipatedMonthlyTransactionsOutgoingHe: Estimate the volume of transactions you expect to make monthly. Example: from 1 to 49, from 50 to 99, from 100 to 499, etc.
natureBusinessCompanyHelpText: Describe the industry and segment in which your company conducts business.

withdrawText: Before making a transaction, make sure you have the following requirements:
modalTextAccountSpan: Name of the bank where the account is located.
modalTextNumberSpan: Unique number assigned to your bank account.
modalTextTypeAccountSpan: Specifies whether the account is a savings account, checking account, etc.
modalTextCodeAchSpan: Code used to identify your bank in local electronic transfers.
modalTextBankAddressSpan: Address that the user provided to their bank when creating the account.
modalTextNameHolderSpan: Full name of the person who owns the bank account.
modalTextTypeBeneficiarySpan: Specifies whether the beneficiary is a natural or legal person.
modalAbaFedwireSpan: Code used to identify your bank in national bank transfers.
modalBankAddressAbaFedwire: Physical address of the bank branch where the account is maintained.
modalSwiftBicSpan: Code that internationally identifies your bank.
modalSwiftBicSpan2: It is required for international transfers.
modalIbanBeneficiarySpan: International bank account code that facilitates transactions between different countries.

maintenanceDeposit.title: Notification important
maintenanceDeposit.textOne: We inform you that, due to recent changes in our internal policies and compliance regulations, your banking instructions will be temporarily unavailable.
maintenanceDeposit.textTwo: This measure is aimed at ensuring a more secure environment for your transactions, reaffirming our commitment to integrity and trust in every operation.
maintenanceDeposit.textThree: We appreciate your understanding and trust in our institution, and we are continuously working to provide an efficient and secure service.
maintenanceDeposit.textFour: We apologize for any inconvenience and are at your disposal to assist you.

selfieInstructionCaption: Tips to ensure your photo meets the requirements and is easy to process
selfieInstructions: To complete this application step, you must hold your ID card clearly visible next to your face without obstructions. Avoid covering parts of your face or the document, make sure the image is well lit and centered
selfieInstructionExtensionsAllowedCaptio: Only JPG and PNG files are supported, up to 8 MB
documentIdInstructionCaption: Tips to make your documentation compliant and easy to process
documentIdInstructions: These must be valid, clear and without reflections or glare. It must be ensured that all four edges of the document are visible and that the photograph of the holder is clear. In addition, it is recommended to use a flat, dark surface to avoid fingers appearing in the image
documentIdInstructionExtensionsAllowedCa: Only JPG and PNG files are supported, up to 8 MB
